channel.title: Rememblog
channel.description: Blogging what I need to remember!

item.title: A Gentle Intro to Package Management in R
item.dc:creator: Ryan Johnson
item.description: R packages are what truly make R great! This primer will make sure you know exactly where you are installing packages from (what repositories), and where you are installing them to on your computer/server (what libraries).

item.title: Welcome to A gentle intro to Package Management in R
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, A gentle intro to Package Management in R. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!
